description.oldValue:
,CloudKnox Permissions Management is a cloud infrastructure entitlement management (CIEM) solution that provides comprehensive visibility into permissions assigned to all identities like over-privileged workload and user identities, actions, and resources across multi-cloud infrastructures in Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).  CloudKnox Permissions Management detects, automatically right-sizes, and continuously monitors unused and excessive permissions.
GA date: July CY2022
Preview date: February CY2022
description.newValue: ,CloudKnox Permissions Management is a cloud infrastructure entitlement management (CIEM) solution that provides comprehensive visibility into permissions assigned to all identities like over-privileged workload and user identities, actions, and resources across multi-cloud infrastructures in Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).  CloudKnox Permissions Management detects, automatically right-sizes, and continuously monitors unused and excessive permissions.
